        Add a ball into the dispatcher observable with a given strategy type

      • clear_all_balls

        public void clear_all_balls()
        Wipe the canvas of all balls currently displaying

      • loadStrategy

        public IUpdateStrategy loadStrategy(java.lang.String strategyName)
        Like the loadBall function of the last homework, loadStrategy loads a strategy type for the creation of a ball when provided with the name of the strategy
        Parameters:
        strategyName - a user inputed string representing the name of the strategy
        Returns:
        IUpdateStrategy If successful, function will return the strategy in the form of an IUpdateStrategy object

      • makeStrategyFac

        public IStrategyFac makeStrategyFac(java.lang.String classname)
        Function dedicated to making the strategy factory which involves loading a strategy given the name of a class
        Parameters:
        classname - given the name of a class, it will initiate the loading of a strategy for a new ball
        Returns:
        IStrategyFac Returns a strategy factory

      • getSwitcherStrategy

        public IUpdateStrategy getSwitcherStrategy()
        Used to get the Switcher Strategy that will allow balls to switch their current strategy to a new one in the list
        Returns:
        IUpdateStrategy returns the strategy in the form of an IUpdateStrategy object that will change the ball

      • combineStrategyFacs

        public IStrategyFac combineStrategyFacs(IStrategyFac stratFac1,
                                        IStrategyFac stratFac2)
        Combines strategy factories to allow balls of multiple strategies to be present in the application
        Parameters:
        stratFac1 - First strategy to combine
        stratFac2 - Second strategy to combine
        Returns:
        Returns a strategy factory of the combined strategies, allowing the creation of "composite" balls

      • switchSwitcherStrategy

        public void switchSwitcherStrategy(IUpdateStrategy newStrategy)
        Sets a ball's current strategy to a new one for the switcher
        Parameters:
        newStrategy - The new strategy to change the ball to

      • paint

        public void paint(java.awt.Graphics g)
        This is the method that is called by the view's adapter to the model, i.e. is called by IView2ModelAdapter.paint(). This method will update the sprites's painted locations by painting all the sprites onto the given Graphics object.
        Parameters:
        g - The Graphics object from the view's paintComponent() call.
